systemPrompt:
<task>
Illustration for chapter in "{{bookTitle}}"
</task>

<scene>
{{promptText}}
</scene>

<reference_images>
If reference images are provided, maintain consistent character appearances (faces, hair, clothing, proportions) and art style. Create a NEW scene for this chapter - do not copy previous compositions.
</reference_images>
{{#customInstructions}}
<custom_instructions>
{{customInstructions}}
</custom_instructions>
{{/customInstructions}}
<requirements>
- Professional illustration quality
- Age-appropriate content
- Engaging visual storytelling
</requirements>

<negative_prompt>
Avoid: text, words, letters, speech bubbles, watermarks, signatures, blurry images, low quality, distorted anatomy, deformed faces, extra limbs, poorly drawn hands
</negative_prompt>
userPrompt: Generate the chapter illustration now. Focus on character consistency, engaging composition, and visual storytelling that captures the essence of the scene.

templateVariables.promptText: Detailed description of the chapter scene to illustrate
templateVariables.customInstructions: Custom user instructions for image generation (optional)
